title: 4K -The Island on Bird Street (1997) Based on a True Story | Directed by Søren Kragh-Jacobsen

sources.title: 4K -The Island on Bird Street (1997) Based on a True Story | Directed by Søren Kragh-Jacobsen
sources.description:
During World War II, 11-year-old Alex is left to survive alone in the ruins of a ghetto after his father is taken during a raid. He must learn all the tricks to survive in constantly life-threatening conditions. As he evades capture by enemy forces, Alex forms unlikely alliances while holding onto hope of reuniting with his father.

Director: Søren Kragh-Jacobsen
Writers: Uri Orlev, John Goldsmith, Tony Grisoni
Stars: Patrick Bergin, Jordan Kiziuk, Jack Warden
Genres: Foreign Films, Biography, Drama, War


@CultCinemaClassics
